original_text: And the garment, either warp, or woof, or whatsoever thing of skin it be, which thou shalt wash, if the plague be departed from them, then it shall be washed the second time, and shall be clean.
korean_text: 네가 빤 의복의 날에나 씨에나 가죽으로 만든 모든 것에 그 색점이 벗겨졌으면 그것을 다시 빨아야 정하리라

sentences.original_text: And the garment, either warp, or woof
or whatsoever thing of skin it be
if the plague be departed from them
then it shall be washed the second time
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그것은 두 번째로 씻겨질 것이며
